description:
Infernape is the final evolution of the Chimchar evolutionary line. Infernape uses a unique fighting style that utilizes all of its limbs. It is most competitive when it comes to speed. It is one of the only Pok√©mon that can learn both Swords Dance and Nasty Plot.
Infernape is also seemingly based on the main character in the classical Chinese epic novel Journey to the West`s Sun Wu Kong. They are similar as they are both based on monkeys and Infernape`s Gold Armor seems to be alterations of Sun Wu Kong`s Gold Bands.
name: Goukazaru
